Napoleon Area Schools have been receiving phone calls asking what areas of town consist of the two (2) mile no transportation zone. All areas shaded in red on the map is the two mile no transportation zone. If we can safely shrink this no transportation zone because of reduced ridership, we will start adding students from the furthest point away from the schools. Please note that this may take some time and will not happen overnight.
Please understand that the decision to implement the two (2) mile no transportation zone did not come lightly. Unfortunately with the reduced bus capacity guidelines we have to operate within has caused us not to be able to continue with transportation like we have prior to the COVID-19 pandemic. If you have additional questions please contact the transportation department at 419-592-2403.

This is a new system and we ask for your patience as we tweak the system. The numbers being contacted by the auto system are generated from the Emergency Medical Forms. If you would like any changes to these numbers, please contact the school office.
